definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

sentences.english: General lithographic, gravure, flexo printing, and varnish process after printing.
sentences.chinese: 一般平版，凹版，凸版印刷及印後上光油加工。

sentences.english: Use a light table to transfer relief printing image to wood block.
sentences.chinese: 使用光桌轉移凸版印刷圖像塊木頭。

sentences.english: Monitoring the ink viscosity is very important to flexography printing.
sentences.chinese: 掌握好油墨的黏度對於苯胺凸版印刷非常重要。

sentences.english: Hereby the study can treat the better of runnability and printability of water-based ink and flexography.
sentences.chinese: 藉此探討最適彈性凸版印刷之水性印墨適性。

sentences.english: Block printing is the easiest kind of relief printing.
sentences.chinese: 雕版印刷是一種最簡單的凸版印刷。

sentences.english: In development is a mission to up-cycle the now obsolete letterpress.
sentences.chinese: 將來的發展是循環回收現已被淘汰的凸版印刷。

definition: intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
color printing/abbr. for 彩色印刷[cai3 se4 yin4 shua1]
color printing using several overlaid images
lithography/abbr. for 平版印刷[ping2 ban3 yin4 shua1]
